name: Nuggie Hunter
description:
Nuggie Hunter is 2D Platformer in which you play as a Cat. Aliens stole your Chicken Nuggies so you have to get them back.

Features:

  • 35 Levels
  • High quality pixel art graphics
  • Chicken Nuggies
  • 6+ Weapons
  • Bosses

Controls:

  • WASD to move around
  • Space to Jump and to stomp on Enemys
  • LMB to shot
